In the hyperspectral map appears as a thicker brushstroke

Min at 292 and 660-662 nm, max at 527 nm

Tonality different from the 'proper' Maya blue R_03. There is no evidence of a yellow component but the tonality is slightly shifted towards the green. 
Compatible with MB standard synthesized using 1wt % of indigo heated at higher temperatures than 130° C

Result: Maya blue
Min at 292 and 662 nm
